Name: FURRY GIRL PUZZLE
About the game: FURRY GIRL PUZZLE - a logical game in which your task is to collect puzzles and open the pictures with furry girls. You need to collect from the small pictures one big and after you may to going at the next level. Admin Mode: R - reload level E - fast open the level if you are in the menu. Q - reset the level to 1. Features: Simple controls (mouse) Relaxing soundtrack. Beautiful furry girls. 15 lvls. Gallery. 3 modes: easy, normal, hard. For changing difficulty mode, in 'level choose' screen, press button (puzzle) in the left down side and choose difficulty (easy - green heart, normal - orange heart, hard - red heart) 2 modes: arts with censored and uncensored (For changing modes, press button (18+) in the right down side on 'level choose screen') Steam achievements. Credits: Programming: AFBIK Studio Music and effects: zapsplat
